      • setApplicationParameters

        protected void setApplicationParameters(int maxMsgsPerSec,
                                        int maxMsgsPerCycle,
                                        int maxMsgsPerTimeSlot,
                                        int numberOfTimeSlots,
                                        java.awt.Component parent)
        Set the application parameters in the database
        Parameters:
        maxMsgsPerSec - maximum number of messages that can be downlinked in one second
        maxMsgsPerCycle - maximum number of messages that can be downlinked before repeating the message list
        maxMsgsPerTimeSlot - maximum number of messages per time slot
        numberOfTimeSlots - number of time slots in the scheduler definition table
        parent - component calling this method, used for positioning any error dialogs
